По моему мнению одна из лучших игр, правда геймплей немного надоедает. 
Разработчики постоянно добавляют новых персонажей, обновляют античит ( хотя читеров я не видел ) 
И вообще баги можно увидеть очень редко, хотя когда они случаются то становиться очень весело.
Игра очень понравилась. Приобрёл не задумываясь со скидкой и не пожалел. Радует что есть убийцы из моих любимых фильмов и сериалов.

Dead by Daylight is a PvPvE video game where you play as either a survivor or a killer. As a survivor it's you and 3 easy mode AI versus another person playing as a killer. As a killer, it's you versus 4 professional players hoping to be lucky enough to hook a single survivor. Overall, one of the best CBT simulators you can buy.

嗨 我好爛

用臉撞鬼是我

Sneaking around opponents controlled by the AI is tricky enough. Sneaking around opponents controlled by other humans is a challenge on an entirely different level - especially when they're coming after you with a chainsaw and one wrong move means the difference between survival and death.

Dead by Daylight features four players as survivors pitted against one other player as the killer. The survivors must repair five generators around the map in order to open the gates that lead to safety before the killer catches them, while the killer must hunt down the survivors and sacrifice them on meat hooks to the Entity before they can escape. There are over a dozen survivors and killers each, with new characters being added by DLC every few months. Every killer has their own special weapon and/or power that makes them unique to play as and play against. Also, all characters have their own set of perks that can be unlocked for everyone else, letting you customize your favorite character with the perks that best fit your playstyle.

Unfortunately, the game has plenty of bugs and glitches that can show up at inopportune moments. Perfectly good matches can be ruined by laggy servers or disconnecting players. Progression is also noticeably grindy, whether you're leveling up your characters to get better perks and items or making your way through the Rift to acquire special cosmetics.

So far, I've only played as a survivor, mostly because I enjoy games that encourage using stealth and wits to succeed. And let me tell you, this game is downright intense! There's the panic of knowing the killer is nearby but not exactly where, the relief of successfully avoiding the killer's attention altogether, the satisfaction of saving your teammates, and the joy of a fellow survivor arriving just in time to pull you from the brink of death...at least until the killer sends you running for the hills all over again.

So whether you're looking for a few good scares with your friends, you're aiming to rank yourself among the best, or you just want to play as your favorite horror movie villain, Dead by Daylight has the thrills you're looking for.

La verdad un juego totalmente recomendable, muy divertido jugando solo de superviviente o asesino, y mas divertido si lo jugas con amigos , lo venia siguiendo desde hace tiempo y no me animaba a comprarlo porque pense que iba a ser aburrido y la verdad que nada que ver.. Muy divertido , buena comunidad , muchas formas diferentes de jugar a los mismos personajes de un bando o el otro .. vale la pena comprarlo cuando este o no en oferta!
